A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can't say much other than what's all ready been said about this garbage pile...

But it goes like this - JJ Abrams sets up Rian Jonshon for a sweet slam dunk with the ultimate alley-oop called The Force Awakens... Anticipation is high - Johnson is in the air! He has the ball! He then lands on the ground\, chucks the ball into the nose bleed seats\, places his palms at his mouth and makes a fart noise\, then gives double middle fingers to everything Star Wars ever was or could be. Absolute disaster... 

No stars. This makes Phantom Menace look like an absolute masterpiece.
